# External Directory

This directory contains third-party libraries and external dependencies used in this project. Each subdirectory corresponds to a specific library or dependency, along with its source code and any necessary configuration files.

## Raylib 

### This folder should contain:

- `raylib/include/` -> raylib header files
- `raylib/lib/` -> raylib .lib files

### Download the prebuilt Windows version of raylib here:

🔗 https://github.com/raysan5/raylib/releases

For full project setup instructions:  
👉 [See main README](../README.md)
